dct_description_sm: Giacomo Castaldo piemontese de villa Franca, cosmographo.
Decorative cartouches, elaborate marks symbolizing ocean, ships, sea monster.
Latitude and longitude numbers along border, along with explanations.
Descriptive text in cartouche, including dedication.
"Questa è la vera descrittione di tutta la Spagna..."
